Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: "Display a list of all delays in the specified object.\\r\\n\\r\\nFor theatres using the NIP cnpc system, this is commonly used to detect if the cnpc is alive or not."
"+delays me\\r\\n Display all delays in your body.\\r\\n\\r\\n+delays harry\\r\\n Display all delays in Harry's body\\r\\n\\r\\n+delays \\"Marrach:players:K:kalle\\"\\r\\n Display all delays in \."
